title: Proficiency Diagnosis and Enhancement Process for Instructional Design Competencies (Mobile-Based) (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic instructional design concepts and experience in job-related language education
context.additional_context: Course for professionals developing language education content at vocational training institutions. Conducted via mobile-based microlearning, focusing on developing competency diagnostic tools applicable to actual job contexts

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose core instructional design competencies (needs analysis, content development, assessment design, etc.) through self-evaluation
Learners can analyze personal competency gaps using a 5-point Likert-scale self-report assessment tool
Learners can develop customized learning plans aligned with job-specific characteristics based on diagnostic results
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
